songs.title: Where Do We Go from Here
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
My man don't love me no more
He said he needed a little time
To clear his mind
Meanwhile, I'm losing mine

[Verse 1]
We're at the crossroads, my dear
Where do we go from here?
Maybe you will go, maybe you'll stay
Oh, I know I'm gonna miss you either way

[Chorus]
It's such a lonely road (Where do we go from here?)
All I can do is
Follow the tracks of my tears, oh

[Verse 2]
When I cry your name, am I calling in vain?
Oh, am I waiting only to drown in pain? Oh
Don't you do it, no, said don't you leave me this way
I don't know if I can lift my head and face another day

[Chorus]
Oh, it's such a lonely road (Where do we go from here?)
All I can do is
Follow the tracks of my tears (Tears)

[Bridge]
Usually not the kinda girl who's lost and looking for direction
Who could this be, staring at me?
When I'm looking in the mirror trying to find a resolution
Me too far gone, to find my way home

[Outro]
Where do we go from here?
All I can do is
Follow the tracks of my tears, oh
Where do we go from here?
(Maybe you won't go, maybe you'll stay)
All I can do is
Follow the tracks of my tears (Follow either way)
Ooh, ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh, ooh
